China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 2 月 28 日星期三 03:14:00 GMT 120
Asian shares meander as US inflation test awaits; kiwi slidesAsian stocks were tentative on Wednesday ahead of a U.S. inflation reading this week that could influence the timing of the Federal Reserve's easing cycle, while the New Zealand dollar fell sharply after the central bank softened its hawkish stance on rates. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 02:33:08 GMT 55724ZNXXBIAPATESTLFLX64EQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-02-28/Ankur Banerjee市场
China says Beijing and Moscow should strengthen coordination on Asia PacificChina and Russia should strengthen communication and coordination in Asia Pacific affairs and jointly safeguard regional security, stability and development, the Chinese foreign ministry reported on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 02:15:23 GMT 32QSN5CV4JMLNONMWGLV6KSAPA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-says-beijing-moscow-should-strengthen-coordination-asia-pacific-2024-02-28/Reuters世界亚太地区
Oil eases as Fed caution outweighs talk of OPEC+ cut extensionsOil prices slipped in early Asian trade on Wednesday as the prospect of a delayed U.S. rate cutting cycle offset the boost provided by talk of extensions to production cuts from OPEC+. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 01:45:18 GMT NRA7JSUKFNLXJOAVKNHJKGIHEI https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/oil-eases-fed-caution-outweighs-talk-opec-cut-extensions-2024-02-28/Reuters商业活力
Chinese navy's presence in South China Sea is 'worrisome', says Philippine presidentPhilippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. on Wednesday said the Chinese navy's presence in the South China Sea is "worrisome" but will not deter his country from defending its maritime territory and protecting its fishermen. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 00:48:04 GMT 76BQ5CUAMRPXPAABAACNRWFF4Q https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinese-navys-presence-south-china-sea-is-worrisome-says-philippine-president-2024-02-28/Reuters世界亚太地区
Country Garden faces liquidation petition in new blow to China property sectorCountry Garden Holdings said on Wednesday a liquidation petition has been filed against the embattled developer for non-payment of a loan worth $205 million, adding to the woes for China's liquidity crisis-hit property sector. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 00:47:37 GMT KLNJQCRTHJKAHJCANHDU7JJFLQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-country-garden-faces-winding-up-petition-failure-pay-2045-mln-loan-2024-02-28/Scott Murdoch, Clare Jim, Yu Xie世界中国
China urges largest nuclear states to negotiate a 'no-first-use' treatyStates with the largest nuclear arsenals should negotiate a treaty on no-first-use of nuclear weapons against each other or make a political statement in this regard, the Chinese foreign ministry's arms control department said. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 00:14:30 GMT LXZH3JSALVL37MCL32GQLSMR6I https://www.reuters.com/world/china-urges-un-define-roadmap-exempt-non-nuclear-states-nuclear-threat-state-2024-02-28/Reuters世界
